title: Obstructive Sleep Apnea Hypopnea
description: A comprehensive guide to Obstructive Sleep Apnea Hypopnea, including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Obstructive Sleep Apnea Hypopnea is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Sleep-Wake Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
